org.waarp.http.protocol

Class HttpSessionAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.http.protocol.HttpSessionAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpSession
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpDeleteSession, HttpDownloadSession, HttpResumableSession

    public class HttpSessionAbstract
extends Object
implements HttpSession
    Common part for HttpSession for both download and upload
